messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT: doll help! WAS  Allowances?
messages.msgSnippet: You can customize the American Girls dolls with hair and eye color, skin tone. Unfortunately I couldn t get one with one green eye and one brown eye like me
messages.messageBody:
You can customize the American Girls dolls with hair and eye color, skin tone. Unfortunately I couldn't get one with one green eye and one brown eye like me LOL!

MamaBeth

DACunefare@... wrote:
**I offer lots of times to pay half of something if they'll save up the other
half - especially for fairly expensive items.**

Which reminds me! Sarah saved and saved to buy herself a My Twinn doll to
look like her, she got the catalogs and video info in December and planned to buy
one in January - on January 17th we headed to the website to place our order
and found the company is shut down and in bankruptcy. She is very very sad.

If anyone has a lead on another way to produce a doll around 24" modeled
after a particular child, please email me offlist. Thanks! DACunefare @ aol.com
(take out the spaces)

Deborah in IL

messages.messageBody:
**I offer lots of times to pay half of something if they'll save up the other
half - especially for fairly expensive items.**

Which reminds me! Sarah saved and saved to buy herself a My Twinn doll to
look like her, she got the catalogs and video info in December and planned to buy
one in January - on January 17th we headed to the website to place our order
and found the company is shut down and in bankruptcy. She is very very sad.

If anyone has a lead on another way to produce a doll around 24" modeled
after a particular child, please email me offlist. Thanks! DACunefare @ aol.com
